Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal

[Groovy] Class UriUtils

    • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal.UriUtils

    • Collection of utilities to work with resolved URIs. Outputs of methods in here would typically be VfsURI or VfsURICollection.

      Authors:
      Schalk W. Cronj√©
      Since:
      1.0

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          static VfsURICollection emptyURICollection()
          Returns an empty ResolvedURICollection
          static VfsURICollection localURIs(VfsURICollection uris)
          Creates a live filtered list which only contain local file URIs
          static VfsURICollection remoteURIs(VfsURICollection uris)
          Creates a live filtered list which do not contain any local file URIs
          static VfsURI uriWithOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> opts, VFS vfs, java.lang.Object uri)
          Takes a URI and stages it in the context of a VFS.
          static VfsURICollection uriWithOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> opts, VFS vfs, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> uris)
          Takes a list of URIs and stages them in the context of a VFS.
          static VfsURICollection uriWithOptions(VFS vfs, java.util.List<VfsCopySource> copySources)
          Takes a list of VfsCopySource and stages them in the context of a VFS.

        • static VfsURICollection emptyURICollection()

          Returns an empty ResolvedURICollection

          Returns:
          ResolvedURICollection instance with no members

        • static VfsURICollection localURIs(VfsURICollection uris)

          Creates a live filtered list which only contain local file URIs

          Returns:
          Filtered list
          Parameters:
          uris - Original list

        • static VfsURICollection remoteURIs(VfsURICollection uris)

          Creates a live filtered list which do not contain any local file URIs

          Returns:
          Filtered list
          Parameters:
          uris - Original list

        • static VfsURI uriWithOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> opts, VFS vfs, java.lang.Object uri)

          Takes a URI and stages it in the context of a VFS. All supplied options will applied as far as possible. Non-VFS options will be added as praxis options.

          Returns:
          A resolved URI with praxis options
          Parameters:
          opts - Vfs and praxis options
          vfs - The VFS to stage against.
          uri - The URI to stage

        • static VfsURICollection uriWithOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> opts, VFS vfs, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> uris)

          Takes a list of URIs and stages them in the context of a VFS. All supplied options will applied as far as possible. Non-VFS options will be added as praxis options.

          Returns:
          List of staged URIs
          Parameters:
          opts - Vfs and praxis options
          vfs - The VFS to stage against.
          uri - List of URIs to stage

        • static VfsURICollection uriWithOptions(VFS vfs, java.util.List<VfsCopySource> copySources)

          Takes a list of VfsCopySource and stages them in the context of a VFS. All supplied options will applied as far as possible. Non-VFS options will be added as praxis options.

          Returns:
          List of staged URIs
          Parameters:
          vfs - The VFS to stage against.
          copySources - List of VfsCopySource instances to convert.
